<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158360</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3138</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">English Curriculum for all grades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englischer Lehrplan für alle Grade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Programme d'études anglais pour toutes les 
catégories</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curriculum inglês para todas as classes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di studi inglese per tutti i gradi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικό πρόγραμμα σπουδών για όλους τους βαθμούς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan de estudios inglés para todos los grados</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">THis is a hyperlinked document which provides the principles and standards for learning English as a foreign language in Israeli schools</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">standards</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">principles</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist a hyperlinked Dokument, das die 
Grundregeln und die Standards für erlernenenglisch als Fremdsprache 
in den israelischen Schulen zur Verfügung stellt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ceci est a hyperlinked le document qui fournit 
les principes et les normes pour l'anglais d'étude comme langue 
étrangère dans les écoles israéliennes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é a hyperlinked o original que fornece os 
princípios e os padrões para o inglês de aprendizagem como uma 
língua extrangeira em escolas israeli</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è a hyperlinked il documento che fornisce i
principii e gli standard per l'inglese imparante come lingua straniera
in scuole israeliane</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το THis είναι α το έγγραφο που παρέχει τις αρχές 
και τα πρότυπα για την εκμάθηση των αγγλικών ως ξένη γλώσσα στα 
ισραηλινά σχολεία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es a hyperlinked el documento que 
proporciona a los principios y a los estándares para el inglés que 
aprende como idioma extranjero en escuelas israelíes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Standards</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundregeln</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">normes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">principes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">padrões</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">princípios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">standard</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">principii</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρότυπα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estándares</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">principios</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
